% Test für Register
%
\catcode`\{=1 % left brace is begin-group character
\catcode`\}=2 % right brace is end-group character
%
%
\count7=11

\the\count7
%%%
%%%
%%%
%\endinput
%\count7=13
%\count1=01
%\count2=2
%\count70000=70001
%\countdef\hugo=7
%\count9=\hugo
%\the\count2
%\the\hugo
%%
%% gacount 
%\gacount0=123
%\gacount100=2
%\gacountdef\peter=100
%\gacount0=\peter
%\the\peter
%%
%% alloccountarray
%\alloccountarray\anja50
%\anja1=34
%\anja49=33
%%\anja50=50% wirft einen Fehler
%\countarraydef\anja\uschi=49
%\uschi=1033
%\the\uschi
%%
%% size (im Moment nur Ausgabe im Log)
%\size\count
%\size\gacount
%\size\anja
%\size\uschi
%%
%% advance
%%\advance  % wirft Fehler, da kein Register folgt
%%\advance\count7 % wirft Fehler, da kein by gefunden
%%\advance\count7 by % wirft Fehler, da keine Nummer folgt
%\advance\count7 by 10
%\advance\count7 by -1
%\advance\gacount0 by 7
%\advance\hugo by 1
%\advance\anja1 by -34
%\advance\uschi by 2
%%
%% multiply & divide
%\multiply\count7 by 2
%\multiply\gacount0 by 3
%\multiply\hugo by 4
%\multiply\anja49 by 2
%\multiply\uschi by 3
%\multiply\uschi by 999
%%
%\divide\uschi by 100
%%
%\count300=7
%\the\count300
%%
%% 
%\dimen1=100pt
%%
%\the\dimen1
%%
%\dimen2=100000sp
%\dimen3=20cm
%\dimen4=1in
%%
%\gadimen1=12pt
%\the\gadimen1
%%
%\dimen7=99pt
%\dimendef\dhugo=7
%\dimen9=\dhugo
%\the\dimen7
%\the\dhugo
%%
%% allocdimenarray
%\allocdimenarray\petra50
%\petra1=34pt
%\petra49=33pt
%\dimenarraydef\petra\heike=49
%\heike=1033pt
%\the\heike
%%
%% size (im Moment nur Ausgabe im Log)
%\size\dimen
%\size\gadimen
%\size\petra
%\size\heike
%%
%%
%% real ----------------------------------
%\real7=234.45
%\the\real7
%%
%\gareal1=12.34
%\the\gareal1
%%
%\real7=99
%\realdef\rhugo=7
%\real9=\rhugo
%\the\real7
%\the\rhugo
%%
%% allocdimenarray
%\allocrealarray\pet50
%\pet1=34
%\pet49=33
%\realarraydef\pet\hei=49
%\hei=1033
%\the\hei
%%
%% size (im Moment nur Ausgabe im Log)
%\size\real
%\size\gareal
%\size\pet
%\size\hei

%%
%\skip6=45pt plus 1pt minus 2pt
%\the\skip6
%%
%\gaskip1=12.34mm minus 1.2mm
%\the\gaskip1
%%
%\skip7=99pt
%\skipdef\shugo=7
%\skip9=\shugo
%\the\skip7
%\the\shugo
%%
%% allocskiparray
%\allocskiparray\asd50
%\asd1=34cm
%\asd49=33pt
%\skiparraydef\asd\heido=49
%\heido=1033pt
%\the\heido
%%
%% -------------------------------------------------
%\muskip7=4mu plus 3mu minus 2mu
%\the\muskip6
%%
%\gamuskip1=12.34mu minus 1.2mu
%\the\gamuskip1
%%
%\muskip7=99mu
%\muskipdef\mushugo=7
%\muskip9=\mushugo
%\the\muskip7
%\the\mushugo
%%
%% allocskiparray
%\allocmuskiparray\amusd50
%\amusd1=34mu
%\amusd49=33mu
%\muskiparraydef\amusd\muheido=49
%\muheido=1033mu

%\the\muheido

%\the\toks89

%\the\gatoks1
